scenario_text.value:
Urgh... I cannot let Agumon face them on his
own!

Stop it, Falcomon! You can’t fight with
injuries like that!

It is...but a trifle...
I cannot allow them lay a hand on you!

Falcomon... I’m so, so sorry.
I’ve been too careless this whole time...

The fact that you got injured at all is...
is my fault!

And instead of criticizing me for it, you're
still trying to protect me despite your injury.

I’m scared... Is there any way we can
escape?!

Do not debase yourself, Minoru. You are not
usually so craven.
...Falcomon.

Now then, here I go—ugh!
I...I will be your opponent!
...Huh? Still looking for some punishment?
Ah! It’s too dangerous, Falcomon!
Rrk!

Minoru!
I can’t believe you jumped in front of me!

Ha ha, my body moved on its own... I just
wanted to protect ya, buddy. Ouch...

Like I have what it takes to protect anyone.
Ha ha...pathetic...

You are not pathetic! I understand your
strength, Minoru, as well as your kindness.

Your heart protected me so...
It makes me so happy—HAAAUGH!

What...what is this?!
Oh...not bad at all...
Falcomon?!

Your power becomes my own, Minoru...
So behold... This is your own power!
Uwooooooh!
Ahhhh, I’m so ashamed!

Worry not... If you have that spirit, and if
you truly feel regret...

If you want to get stronger...
then you will, Minoru! I’m sure of it!
Falcomon...?

I can feel it...
Your desire for strength!
Wow...!
Now then, here I go!
